entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Risk of thundershowers early this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
